text: "Fly Like an Eagle" is a 1976 song by Steve Miller Band and is the title track from their ninth studio album of the same name. It went to number 2 in both Canada and the United States and number 21 in the Netherlands. ==Seal version== In 1996, Seal covered Fly Like an Eagle for the 1996 movie Space Jam. It went to number 2 in Canada, number 10 in the United States, number 13 in the United Kingdom, number 18 in Iceland, number 20 in Scotland, number 29 in New Zealand and number 38 in Switzerland. == References == Category:1976 songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Steve Miller Band songs Category:Seal songs
title: Fly Like an Eagle (song)
